p: COVID-19 is a respiratory infection by SARS-CoV-2 originally seen in Wuhan city of China, now become the pandemic worldwide ( 1). In the past, coronavirus caused epidemics such as SARS and MERS (Middle East Respiratory Syndrome) in 2013 and 2018, respectively in China, and Saudi Arabia ( 2). COVID-19 was first recognized as intense pneumonia in a medical facility in Wuhan, Hubei Province of China. Later the virus was renamed as SARS-CoV-2. Within a few months, the epidemic spread globally and declared as a pandemic by WHO. The signs and symptoms of COVID-19 include fever, cough, weakness, headache, haemoptysis, diarrhoea, dyspnoea, and lymphopenia. The clinical features identified by chest CT-scans are pneumonia with unusual features such as RNAaemia, acute respiratory distress syndrome, the occurrence of the ground-glass opacity and severe end-organ injury that lead to the death of infected human ( 3).
